data.name: Zombie Wars
data.detailed_description:
ZOMBIE BATTLES;

Impressive weapons, simple fun and immersive maps. Survive and destroy the zombies. Kill more zombies and get more money. Improve your skills and race yourself on practice maps.

Game Modes

ZOMBIE WAVE MODE: In this mode, you have to kill all zombies up to 20 waves. No extra lives, no bombs, just guns and bullets. Collect the falling objects from the zombies and survive. Kill more zombies and earn money to get more different weapons and open weapon boxes. Once you've finished all the waves, you can move on to the next section.

TRAINING MODE In this mode, you can enter one of the practice maps and test your skills and experience weapons. You will also learn a little about general game mechanics and weapon dynamics. Remember, first of all you have to survive.

current and Dynamic

Up-to-date maps will always be added, updated weapons and different zombies will be added. Let us know about your experiences, problems and anything you want to change about the game. Steam trading cards and in-game achievements will be updated soon. We would like to state that the game is currently in the trial phase. We will develop and grow together with you valuable players.

data.short_description: ZOMBIE WARS, survive and kill zombies. A fun world with different weapons and maps.
data.supported_languages: English, German, Turkish, French, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Portuguese, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bits Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K@3.3GHz or AMD FX 6300@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 or AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bits Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K@3.5GHz or Ryzen 5 1500X@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Zombie Wars contains adult content such as violence and gore.
